H0.text: It kills cancer cells is a benefit of using radiation as a medical treatment.

H1.text: It produces healthy cells is a benefit of using radiation as a medical treatment.

H2.text: It improves immune system function is a benefit of using radiation as a medical treatment.

H3.text: It prevents many forms of illness in patients is a benefit of using radiation as a medical treatment.

A4.text: Radiation therapy works by damaging the DNA of cancer cells and can cause them to undergo mitotic catastrophe.

A5.text: Radiation therapy may be curative in a number of types of cancer if they are localized to one area of the body
